Description: Your Impact:• Processing the invoices of India AP• Good knowledge of accounting entries.• Knowledge of GST related to AP side• Knowledge of TDS rate applicability as per India law• Good knowledge of Excel      • Ability to organize and prioritize workloads, multi-task and meet required deadlines       • Ability to identify issues, analyze possible solutions and independently resolve problems with medium complexity      • Perform additional assignments, as directed by the Supervisor      • Provide year-end support of preparation of Audit Schedule and other audit requirements as required      • Provide the support to provide the documentation part and other requirement as per income compliances.Here’s What You’ll Need:· B.com Graduate·        3 to 5 years of Experience in Accounts Payable·Strong communication skills with cross functional and external stakeholdersAt Jacobs, we’re challenging today to reinvent tomorrow by solving the world’s most critical problems for thriving cities, resilient environments, mission-critical outcomes, operational advancement, scientific discovery and cutting-edge manufacturing, turning abstract ideas into realities that transform the world for good. With $13 billion in revenue and a talent force of more than 55,000, Jacobs provides a full spectrum of professional services including consulting, technical, scientific and project delivery for the government and private sector.Job Details
